description: Late fee history list of hospital accounts.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account for this row.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated late fee history in this guarantor account. Together with ACCT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ACCT_EB_LTFEE_HIST table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple hospital accounts that are associated with the guarantor account and the late fee history from the ACCT_EB_LTFEE_HIST table.

columns.name: LTF_HX_HAR_LST
columns.description: This row contains the  hospital accounts upon which late fees were applied for the guarantor.
